question:
In Ryotwari System, British retained the right to:
1. eject the peasant at the will of the British
2. enhance the land revenue at the will of the British
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Ryotwari system was introduced by Thomas Munro in 1820. As per the Ryotwari System, Peasants were made proprietors. The Ryotwari system allowed the state to deal directly with the cultivator (Ryot) for revenue collection. The percentage of revenue was very high and it was chaged after every thirty years.
